message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $10000. Considering this, I am offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure such an asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.
